entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible optimisation for derefencing a span pointer #80086
    Future
  • Large memory allocation using System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow #80080
  • Breaking change with timeout reading serial port in .NET 7 (Possible Overlapped I/O change) #80079
  • Causing diffrent memory layout in .NET 6 and .NET 7 when field member has LayoutKind.Auto #80077
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher` matches glob pattern `/*/` against file path `/a/b`, but it shouldn't. #80076

Closed

  • When compiling Blazor Hybrid app with NativeAOT, can't root System.Action generic #80075
  • Question; Is this the expected Sse41.BlendVariable behavior? #80081
  • Possible memory leak under Windows 7 #80078
  • The performance of java is almost twice that of C# #78691
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.55902 is missing from symbol servers. #79996
    8.0.0
  • Access Violation in Interop+Sys.ChDir #79864

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix XML documentation #80085
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include corerun in Mono testhost #80082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Updated

  • Improve the performance of ConditionalWeakTable.TryGetValue #80059
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand compare + brfalse/brtrue with single conditional branch opcode #80046
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP/2 extended connect hang #80066
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Replace the last two SIMDIntrinsic in LIR with NamedIntrinsic and delete GT_SIMD #80027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
